name: NonHeparinAnticoagulantsForVTETreatment
title: Non Heparin Anticoagulants for VTE Treatment
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for non-heparin anticoagulants for VTE treatment.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent non-heparin anticoagulants given for treatment of a VTE.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent anticoagulants given for VTE prophylaxis.
Excludes concepts that represent heparin.)
